name: Road to RU
description:
Road To Ru Project

Project carried out as part of the course "Programming for video games" of the training Gamagora 2022-2023 by SavroSuarm and Matda.

Purpose :
Road to RU is a Frogger like game. You are a Gamagora student who needs to go to the RU (Restaurant Universitaire), in order to eat for noon. You must therefore reach your table without being knocked down by the various obstacles.
